Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

Class BlockStateProviderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.client.model.generators.BlockStateProvider
      • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.BlockStateProviderBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.data.IDataProvider
    public abstract class BlockStateProviderBase
extends net.minecraftforge.client.model.generators.BlockStateProvider
    A base class for block state and model provider. When overriding this you should call the manualState and manualModel methods in setup. Unlike the other provider this has an extra method because custom models would not generate if not done there. Another thing you can do is override defaultState and defaultModel to adjust the state and model depending on the block.

      • defaultState

        protected void defaultState​(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation id,
                            net.minecraft.block.Block block,
                            net.minecraftforge.client.model.generators.ModelFile model)
        Creates a block state for the given block using the given model. The default implementation checks whether the block has the properties BlockStateProperties.HORIZONTAL_FACING or BlockStateProperties.FACING and creates block states matching those.

      • defaultModel

        protected net.minecraftforge.client.model.generators.ModelFile defaultModel​(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation id,
                                                                            net.minecraft.block.Block block)
        Creates a model for the given block. The default implementation always creates cube_all models.
